remarks: The involution operation of the star division ring for the final constructed Hilbert space.  (Contributed by NM, 20-Jun-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 28-Jun-2015.)
statement:
hlhilnvl.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
hlhilnvl.u $e |- U = ( ( HLHil ` K ) ` W ) $.
hlhilnvl.r $e |- R = ( Scalar ` U ) $.
hlhilnvl.i $e |- .* = ( ( HGMap ` K ) ` W ) $.
hlhilnvl.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
hlhilnvl $p |- ( ph -> .* = ( *r ` R ) ) $.
